title: Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat Fitness & Exercise Mat with Easy-Cinch Yoga Mat Carrier Strap, 72"L x 24"W x 2/5 Inch Thick; color: teal
descriptions:
Product 1: Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat Fitness & Exercise Mat

Experience ultimate comfort and stability with our Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat. Measuring 72 inches in length, 24 inches in width, and 2/5 inch in thickness, this mat is perfect for all your yoga, Pilates, and floor exercise needs. Weighing just 3.11 pounds, it's easy to carry around. Crafted from NBR foam, this teal-colored mat offers extra thickness and a soft cushion for your joints. Plus, it comes with a carrier strap for easy transport.

Product 2: Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat Fitness & Exercise Mat with Easy-Cinch Yoga Mat Carrier Strap

Upgrade your fitness routine with our Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat. This mat measures 72L, 24W, and 2/5 Inch Thick, providing ample space and cushioning for your yoga, Pilates, and floor exercises. Weighing only 3.11 pounds, it's lightweight and easy to carry. Made from NBR foam, this mat offers extra thickness and a soft cushion for your joints. The included easy-cinch carrier strap makes it convenient to take your mat wherever you go.

Product 3: Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat Fitness & Exercise Mat

Enhance your workout experience with our Gaiam Essentials Thick Yoga Mat. With dimensions of 72 inches in length, 24 inches in width, and 2/5 inch in thickness, this mat is ideal for yoga, Pilates, and floor exercises. Weighing just 3.11 pounds, it's lightweight and portable. The mat is made from NBR foam, offering extra thickness and a soft cushion for your joints. It also includes a carrier strap for easy transportation.
